item.title: Outside 85, 21st February
item.description:
The builders repairing the house that was burnt out have destroyed the grass verge outside causing milud to go everywhere. They should be force to fix this before carrying on to allow the grass to regrow
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 81, Brooklyn Road, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Numerous potholes on Horsefair Street between junction of Lyefield Road West and St Mary’s Church., 21st February
item.description:
Horsefair Street between Lyefield Road West and the intersection by St Mary’s Church is littered with numerous potholes. This stretch of road was not re-surfaced when surrounding roads were a couple of years ago. The closure of A40 has caused huge increase in traffic on this road and is in dire need of repair. Now that the A40 is back open, there is an opportunity to sort this out. The residents along here have put up with months of inconvenience due to increased traffic and now have a deteriorated road surface that is a danger to cars and people.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 24, Horsefair Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole round road drain nest too previous repair, 21st February
item.description:
Travelling toward Gloucester there is a large repaired section of road that his deteriorating. .The tarmac around the drain has developed into a large pothole and is getting worse.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 73, Ermin Street, Brockworth, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole on Mini Roundabout, 21st February
item.description:
Large pothole on carriageway of mini roundabout as you come from Crosshands roundabout towards Gloucester. Difficult to see until you are right on it and is in the middle of the carriageway.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Abbotswood Road, Brockworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Warning sign of 2-way traffic ahead is missing on 126167, 21st February
item.description:
North Street, Cheltenham, at the junction with Albion Street. This sign is close to the carriageway and is frequently scraped by vehicles (maybe by buses pulling in at the adjacent bus stop)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, North Street, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham

item.title: Bloced drain, 20th February
item.description:
The drain by the substation, between 17, 24 and 24 Wellington Lane. This was blocked after works was carried out to repair a mains leak in November, resulting in silt build up in the drain. With the recent bad weather this can cause minor flooding.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22, Wellington Lane, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tons of holes and uneven crumbling ground, 20th February
item.description:
PLEASE do something about this road. Properly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 109, Village Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lipson road is a disgrace, 20th February
item.description:
ALL of Lipson Road. Just go take a look! Its been like it for a good 5 years - bodge jobs are done and it crumbles within days. Whilst you're at it, head to Village Road too - how is that even allowed to be driven on?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Lipson Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A sizeable pot hole in the middle of the road., 20th February
item.description:
I went through this pothole , see photo , and as it was dark and filled with rain water did not see it and my tyre burst instantly It has cost me 82 pounds to get it changed when they are new tyres. I would like some kind of compensation for this as this has been reported already ( as I can tell from the council website).and nothing has been done. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kidnappers Lane, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bus stop flag missing, 20th February
item.description:
There is a bus stop dead opposite henley road however there has not been a flag for many years. Lots of bus drivers are saying that there isn’t a stop here. Please can a bus stop flag be put back up
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Springbank Road, Springbank, Cheltenham
